application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Notwithstanding the information submitted, prior to the operation of the external lighting details of the operating times of the external lighting shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.The external lighting shall only be operated in accordance with the approved details. Reason: In order to safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers in accordance with policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required for Conditions 4 (Construction Management) and 5 (Lighting Management Plan) of planning permission 21/00009/FUL (Removal of pergola and erection of stand alone new build modular classroom block)
